participant_1.background:
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.
my credit cards are maxed out.
we will be traveling to niagra falls for our honeymoon.
I love to sing to the radio in my car, even though I can't whistle.
I would like to have lunch with a doctor who can help me recover from my knee surgery.

participant_2.background:
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.
I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow.
I'm doing my best to be a good role model for my daughter, and I hope she's learning a lot at school.
i would travel the world if i could.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time in nature and with my mom.
Cool! I spend a lot of time with my family too. We are pretty close.
That's great. I'm glad you have a good support system.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to grow sunflowers, and I'm also a good cook.
Sunflowers are beautiful! I love cooking too. I'm not great at it, but I have fun trying.
I'm sure you're better than you think. And cooking is about the experience, not the outcome!
You're right! I'm learning a lot, and it's always fun to have people to cook for.
Sounds like you're a great cook! I'm sure your family loves your food.
Thanks! I try my best. How about you? What do you like to cook?
I like to cook all kinds of food, but my specialty is Italian.
Oh, that sounds delicious! I love Italian food.
It's my favorite! I love making homemade pasta and sauces.
That's awesome! I'm not very good at making pasta, but I love eating it.
It's not too hard to make. You just need a little patience.
I'll have to give it a try sometime. Thanks for the tip!
